description: In the EC2 API, it is possible to specify which of your registered SSH keys you want to have injected into a machine.  This is not possible in the OS API, at least not in the XML schema.  It looks like it might be possible to specify key_name in the JSON, but this isn't documented nor is it in the schema.
title: No way to specify SSH Key in (XML) OS API
